entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic Snippets Update Tests #60969
    Next
  • Test plan for "Default Interface Implementation of static members" feature #60968
  • Test plan for RelaxingShiftOperator feature #60967
  • Source generators: projectreference #60964
  • VB implement abstract class adds NullableAttributes #60963
  • Option insert_final_newline does not have IDE specified default value #60962
  • StackOverflow when building a core-assembly. #60961
  • Wrong compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initilizer #60960
  • Allow overriding an analyzer's opt-out of analyzing generated source code #60958
  • note: teh CT being in FixAllContext was somewhat a mistake #60957
  • Revert FixAll support for Invert conditional refactoring #60956
    17.3
  • Update and move readme of CodeCleanup #60954
  • Compile Warning(18744): File access preemption #60953

Closed

  • "Convert to raw string" fixer which removes indentation and initial blank line from the string value #59591
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused RPC streaming code from our OOP impl. #60974
    Area-IDE
  • Don't initialize the StackTraceExplorer tool window until it is invoked #60973
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 'main' into RelaxingShiftOperator #60972
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Allow non-Roslyn languages to use Formatter API #60971
    Area-IDE
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #60970
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Simplify implementation of the "remove 'this' or 'me'" analyzer/fixer. #60966
    Area-IDE
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • Update details on "numeric IntPtr" #60722
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60797
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to help cleanup strings with leading whitespace #60936
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename `CodeStyleHostLanguageServices.cs.cs` to `CodeStyleHostLanguageServices.cs` #60955
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove non-servicing branches from our PublishData #60947
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #60951
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Allow VSMac to access LSP options #60943
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60952
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Move the load of project completion providers to background #60950
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Forbid types with required members from substituting for where T : new() #60788
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Use ExpeditedDelay in with our features that pause while non-visible #60608
    Area-IDE
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings (approach #2) #60906
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
